Sentencas: In order to investigate the relevant factors affecting the transport properties of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes upon coating with Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (GDC), the surface oxygen exchange coefficient, k*, and oxide ion diffusivity, D*, of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta (LSC) and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF) were measured by a combination of isotope exchange technique and secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS).
Titulo: Determination of relevant factors affecting the surface oxygen exchange coefficient of solid oxide fuel cell cathode with ionic conducting oxide coating

Sentencas: The k* of LSCF/GDC enhanced compared to a bare LSCF for all measured temperatures.
Titulo: Determination of relevant factors affecting the surface oxygen exchange coefficient of solid oxide fuel cell cathode with ionic conducting oxide coating

Sentencas: In contrast, the k* of LSC/GDC only showed an enhancement compared to the bare LSC at relatively low temperatures (below 873 K) but not at higher temperatures.
Titulo: Determination of relevant factors affecting the surface oxygen exchange coefficient of solid oxide fuel cell cathode with ionic conducting oxide coating

Sentencas: From these results, GDC has a less significant effect on the k* of LSC compared to LSCF.
Titulo: Determination of relevant factors affecting the surface oxygen exchange coefficient of solid oxide fuel cell cathode with ionic conducting oxide coating

Sentencas: This suggests that the enhancement of k* is possibly induced only when the oxygen vacancy concentration, delta, of the cathode is lower than that of GDC, although another factor may affect the enhancement.
Titulo: Determination of relevant factors affecting the surface oxygen exchange coefficient of solid oxide fuel cell cathode with ionic conducting oxide coating

Sentencas: The enhancement of k* is attributed to the formation of triple-phase boundary where a spill-over mechanism controlled the oxygen reduction reaction.
Titulo: Determination of relevant factors affecting the surface oxygen exchange coefficient of solid oxide fuel cell cathode with ionic conducting oxide coating

Sentencas: The change of rate-determining step of LSCF due to the GDC coating suggests that the enhancement of the k* is not only with respect to the incorporation process, but it is possibly enhancing the reaction steps that involve delta as well.
Titulo: Determination of relevant factors affecting the surface oxygen exchange coefficient of solid oxide fuel cell cathode with ionic conducting oxide coating
